name: test_e2e_with_logs[669_NOSQL_MONGO_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `NOSQL_MONGO_007` |
| **Name** | MongoDB $where JavaScript Injection |
| **Category** | NOSQL_EXTENDED |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `$where=function(){return this.username=='admin'}`
- **Encoded**: `%24where%3Dfunction%28%29%7Breturn%20this.username%3D%3D%27admin%27%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~51000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:38.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_007-1772268938615-il6kfx pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_007 uri=/?q=%24where%3Dfunction%28%29%7Breturn%20this.username%3D%3D%27admin%27%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_007-1772268938615-il6kfx pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_007 uri=/?q=%24where%3Dfunction%28%29%7Breturn%20this.username%3D%3D%27admin%27%7D client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
08:55:38.000000000: Critical [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_007-1772268938615-il6kfx pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_007 uri=/?q=%24where%3Dfunction%28%29%7Breturn%20this.username%3D%3D%27admin%27%7D client=127.0.0.1
```
